src¶

Submodules¶

bounce¶

This program simulates the bouncing of balls under various bouncing strategies

Written by Steve LaValle November 2011

ShootInterval(poly, i, j, pt1, pt2, min_ang, max_ang)[source]¶

Shoot Interval

env_gen¶

reg_poly(N, r, x, y)[source]¶

generate regular polygon with n sides, radius r, centered at x,y

Parameters:
  • N (int) – The size of the polygon
  • r (float) – The radius of the polygon
  • (x,y) ((float, float)) – The coordinates of the center of the polygon
Returns:

The regular polygon represented by vertex coordinates
Return type:

list of (float, float)
